body.text: A fiery projectile that explodes on impact.
A swirling vortex of water that pulls enemies in.
A gust of wind that pushes targets back.
A jagged rock that rises from the ground.
A chaotic, unpredictable missile that ricochets.
A beam of pure energy that pierces through enemies.

trail.text: Leaves a trail of burning embers that deals damage over time.
Creates a slick, watery surface that slows movement.
Generates a gentle breeze that increases ally speed.
Forms a temporary rock wall that blocks projectiles.
The trail shifts and changes, causing random debuffs.
The trail hums with energy, increasing spell power.

impact.text: The impact point erupts in a massive fiery explosion.
Upon impact, the water freezes, trapping enemies in ice.
The impact releases a powerful shockwave, silencing foes.
A shower of sharp stone shards erupts from the impact.
The impact tears a temporary rift, teleporting targets randomly.
The impact releases a burst of arcane energy that restores mana.
